Detailed Description

Manpreet Kohli CS 340, Fall 2009

Ball.cpp: creates the ball that bounces around inside the level

Ball motion originally coded by Manpreet Kohli and Ivan Collazo. Later modified by Natraj Subramanian for the use of powerups

Block collision detection and reactive movement coded by Natraj Subramanian

Powerups by Natraj Subramanian

Definition at line 24 of file ball.h.

Member Function Documentation

void Ball::advance ( int  phase  )  [private]

created and modified by all 3 of us function to add motion to the ball inside the board, check for cheat mode, check for collisions, check for powerups, and to check if the ball went beyond the bottom of the screen to respawn

00430                 // When the point of impact is on the BOTTOM
00431                 // end of the block. Y > blockY simply because the

00609             temp->setScene(gameOverScene);

00611

00613             font->setBold(true);
00614             font->setPointSize(60);
00615 
00616             // play game over music

00637 
00638             Constants::timer->disconnect(this->scene(), SLOT(advance()));
00639             Constants::timer->stop();
00640 
00641             QObject::connect(exit, SIGNAL(clicked()), temp->parentWidget(), SLOT(close()));
00642         }
00643 
00644         // Reset all the values and parameters of the ball and disconnect
00645         // it from the timer so that it doesn't start moving immediately
00646         // after respawning
00647         positionX = playersShip->x();             // reset X coordinate to 0
00648         positionY = playersShip->y();             // reset Y coordinate to 0
00649         setPos(positionX, positionY);             // set the coordinates to initial position
00650         factor = 0.25;
00651         directionX = 1.0;                         // set the X-axis increment for the movement
00652         directionY = -1.0;                        // set the Y-axis increment for the movement
00653         Constants::powerup = 0;                   // Reset the powerup value
00654         posXDir = true;

00658         // disconnect the timer with the ball and stop it
